ygData.subject: Re: Reed's Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet V 1.13
ygData.msgSnippet: Must say, I ve been using your spreadsheet for a while now, it s nice having all that info on just 2 pages. Just wanted to mention a couple things...  I just
ygData.messageBody:
Must say, I've been using your spreadsheet for a while now, it's nice having
all that info on just 2 pages.

Just wanted to mention a couple things... I just dinged 53 tonight, and I
can say with a certainty, the level 53 song, Song of Twilight, definitely
does not require an instrument.

Also, are you sure that the 54 song Villa's Verses of Celerity and 55
Cantata of Replenishment are targetted and not group songs? I thought they
changed Jonathan's Provocation because they didn't like giving bards
targetted (ie. not self and not group) buffs.

Anyway, great work on the spreadsheet...

Olgwinn Pendragun
Bard of 53 Songs
Crimson Legacy, E'ci


> Date: Mon, 14 May 2001 18:54:34 -0000
> From: "Reed Stormwind" <eqreed@...>
>Subject: Reed's Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet V 1.13
>
>For those who use it, my latest bard song calculator spreadsheet is
>available. (It's an Excell spreadsheet that calculates numbers given
>level and instruments). It should be up at Rokenn's site shortly
>(www.eqsongs.com) but until then, you can get it here:
>
>http://www.geocities.com/eqreed/BardSongSpreadsheet.html
>
>The main changes are some more sets of numbers have been added, and
>lots of song to song incompatibilities have been added. See the
>Documentation sheet for details.
>
>If you have any comments or modifications (or questions ;), please e-
>mail me at eqreed@.... Enjoy!
>
> - Reed Stormwind (54 bard of E'ci)
